Title: Father's Dilemma
Writer: Cesare Zavattini (story), Cesare Zavattini (screenplay), Alessandro Blasetti (screenplay), Suso Cecchi D'Amico (screenplay)
Actors: Aldo Fabrizi, Gaby Morlay, Ludmilla Dudarova, Lucien Baroux
Plot: The daughter of Signor Carloni is about to take her first communion. A problem arises when the dressmaker spends too much time working on the girl's communion frock.
